sqlMap.select:
SELECT d.manPower ,d.timeUsed ,d.customerId ,d.dailyWKId ,d.ng ,d.ok ,d.pd ,d.partId ,d.qty ,d.dailyWKDetailId ,d.lotNo ,d.staff ,d.workOrderNo ,ISNULL(w.workOrderQty,0) as workOrderQty FROM t_dailywk_detail d LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT workOrderNo, partId, SUM(workOrderQty) AS workOrderQty FROM m_workorder GROUP BY workOrderNo, partId) w ON w.partId = d.partId AND w.workOrderNo = d.workOrderNo
dailywkid = #dailyWKId#
ORDER BY dailyWKId, dailyWKDetailId
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO t_dailywk_detail(manpower, timeused, customerid, dailywkid, dailywkdetailid, ng, ok, partid, pd, qty, lotno, staff, workorderno) VALUES(#manPower#, #timeUsed#, #customerId#, #dailyWKId#, #dailyWKDetailId#, #ng#, #ok#, #partId#, #pd#, #qty#, #lotNo#, #staff#, #workOrderNo#);
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM t_dailywk_ngreason WHERE dailywkid = #dailyWKId# AND dailywkdetailid IN ( SELECT dailywkdetailid FROM t_dailywk_detail WHERE dailywkid = #dailyWKId# ); DELETE FROM t_dailywk_detail WHERE dailywkid = #dailyWKId#;
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_DAILYWK_DETAIL DL INNER JOIN M_WORKORDER WO ON WO.WORKORDERNO = DL.WORKORDERNO INNER JOIN T_DCPLAN DCP ON DCP.DCPLANID = WO.DCPLANID WHERE DCP.DCPLANID = #dcPlanId#
